title: Making sense of all things data
summary: Data scientist Abel Sanchez, executive director and research director of MIT's Geospatial Data Center, emphasizes the importance of digital transformation in utilizing data to make better business decisions. He highlights the challenges of handling the vast amount of data generated from various sources and the need for a new approach to data storage and accessibility. Sanchez also discusses the role of blockchain technology in improving efficiency and productivity, citing examples in the healthcare and agriculture sectors. He concludes by emphasizing the potential of digital transformation to optimize processes, improve decision-making, and drive profitability.
